title: Publisher purges thousands of unlicensed fonts
author: Si_Daniels

comments.content: [Fontwise](http://web.archive.org/web/20131014232025/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Fontwise) is such a brilliant marketing tool for Monotype, both in terms of PR and licensing sales.
The 8 assumptions about EULAs are interesting.
